name: Thalassophobia (itch) (pietrouble)
description:
What is thalassophobia?

Thalassophobia is the intense fear of deep water. The tendency to get intimidated and to have feelings of actual danger from deep or open water.

Created for the 100$ JTAGameJam #6 hosted by JTAGamesInc - https://jtagamesinc.itch.io/

Theme implementing: The goal of the game is not to sink/fall

Tutorial implementing: The player always swim

Assets:

3D Models - TurboSquid - https://www.turbosquid.com/

SFX sounds - Freesound - https://freesound.org/browse/

Music - by me ;)
